entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. 60 percent chance of showers late this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 25 April 2023
